articles.author: Carlo Martuscelli
articles.title: Italian journalist arrested in Iran - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Cecilia Sala is being held in Tehran’s notorious Evin prison, according to her newspaper Il Foglio.
articles.content:
Cecilia Sala, an Italian journalist for the newspaper Il Foglio, was arrested in Iran earlier in the month, Italy’s foreign ministry announced on Friday. 
The arrest took place on Dec. 19 but was on… [+511 chars]
